mapper.select: SELECT num 月,COUNT(month(发起日期)) 数量 FROM [HRM].[dbo].[yuefen] h left join [LRF].[dbo].[LRFlowers_new] l on num=month(发起日期) and 人员编码=#{staffCode} and year(发起日期)=#{year} group by num

SELECT num 月,(case when b.个数 is null then 0 else b.个数 end) 个数 from [HRM].dbo.yuefen a left join
(SELECT count(month(同步日期)) 个数,month(同步日期) 月份 FROM dbo.[SGMSingleprize] H LEFT JOIN [PUBLICDATA].dbo.[DS_STAFF] S ON H.人员编码 = S.人员编码 where S.人员编码=#{staffCode} and year(同步日期)=#{year} group by year(同步日期),month(同步日期),S.人员编码) b on num=b.月份 order by num

SELECT num 月,(case when b.获奖积分 is null then 0 else b.获奖积分 end) 积分 from [HRM].dbo.yuefen a left join (SELECT sum(获奖积分) 获奖积分,month(同步日期) 月份 FROM dbo.[SGMSingleprize] H LEFT JOIN [PUBLICDATA].dbo.[DS_STAFF] S ON H.人员编码 = S.人员编码 where S.人员编码=#{staffCode} and year(同步日期)=#{year} group by year(同步日期),month(同步日期),S.人员编码) b on num=b.月份

select num 月,sum(case when b.奖励金额 is null then 0 else b.奖励金额 end) 奖励金额 from
[HRM].dbo.yuefen a left join
Quality_service.dbo.[HSScore] b on num=month(发起时间) and 人员编码=#{staffCode} and year(发起时间)=#{year} GROUP BY num

select num month,COUNT(biaoyangxingshi) itegral,sum(case when biaoyangxingshi='QQ' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='短信' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='方案跟盯' then 10 when biaoyangxingshi='方案制定' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='方案讲解' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='面谈' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='其他' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='完善客户档案' then 10 when biaoyangxingshi='微信' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='语言需求了解' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='远程' then 20 when biaoyangxingshi='自诉' then 20 end) as money from [HRM].dbo.yuefen a left join DW.dbo.CSC_SmallQualityService b on a.num=MONTH(b.createdon_time) and zixunshi_no=#{staffCode} and YEAR(createdon_time)=#{year} GROUP BY num ORDER BY num
